description: This service exposes various forms of metadata for UVALibrary items that have been digitized. All are GET requests.

endpoints.description: Get the version of this serice
Get a circulation report for the date range specified

params.from: Start date of the report. Format YYYY-MM-DD

params.to: End date of the report. Format YYYY-MM-DD

endpoints.description: Get a list of masterfiles for the given PID
Get a list identifiers that have been published to the DPLA
Get a list identifiers that have been published to viro. Type is required.
Get enriched metadata for a Sirsi item published to Virgo by catalog key.
Get enriched metadata for an XML item published to Virgo by PID.
Get enriched metadata for an XML item published to Virgo by PID
Get a brief summary for any PID
Get the access restrictions for any PID (public, uva or private).
Get the type of data represented by any PID.
Get the text associated with a master file or metadata record by PID.

params.type: Master files only; (transcription|title|description). Determines what text to return

params.pagebreak: Metadata only; include any truthy value to include page breaks in the transcription

endpoints.description: Does a basic search over all metadata and returns broef details on all hits.
Get metadata for a PID. Type is required. Not all PIDs support all types of metadata.
Transform a XML metadata using the provided XSL transform
endpoints.respone: Single/Test responds with transformed XML. Global responds with text UUID of the transform which can be used to check status

formFields.type: test, single or global. Controls scope of transform

formFields.user: computingID of admin user that will be associated with the transform

formFields.pid: The PID of the XML metadata to transform. Only needed for test and single

formFields.xsl: Path to the XSL file for the transform

endpoints.sample: curl -X POST http://https://tracksys-api-ws.internal.lib.virginia.edu/api/transform -H "Content-Type: multipart/form-data" -F user=computeID -F mode=single -F pid=uva-lib:729248 -F xsl=@/path/to/test3.xsl -F "comment=sample note"

endpoints.description: Check the status of a global transform. UUID is returned from POST /api/tramsform
endpoints.respone: Text log of global transform progress
